document_data.name: Stitch
document_data.refs1e: {{Cite dragon/59/Cantrips: Minor magics for would-be wizards|8}}
document_data.mainbody: '''''Stitch''''' was a useful [[cantrip]] that [[wizard]]s-in-training could learn.{{Cite dragon/59/Cantrips: Minor magics for would-be wizards|6}} It added or repaired a seam in either cloth or [[leather]].
document_data.Effects: This cantrip either repaired torn seams or added new seams. Up to {{SI|20|yd|long=yes}} of cloth or {{SI|2|yd|long=yes}} of leather could be sewn with one application of this spell. The seam was the same as one done by a person with sufficient skill in sewing or leatherworking{{Cite dragon/59/Cantrips: Minor magics for would-be wizards|9}}
document_data.Components: This cantrip required [[verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s to cast. The caster spoke a short, rhyming incantation while pantomiming sewing with needle and thread.
